anya-e0905n0:4_0: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, mahatī ayaṁ parisā, evarūpāya parisāya na sukarā sabbaso
anya-e0905n0:4_1: kathaṁ sāvetuṁ, tasmā āyasmato ca javanattherassa pakhukkūnagaravāsino āyasmato ca
anya-e0905n0:4_3: vinayavissajjana bhārañca āvahituṁ okāsaṁ dammi, karotha tumhe āvuso chaṭṭhasaṁgītipubbaṅgamāni
anya-e0905n0:8: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, ahaṁ āyasmantaṁ vicittasārābhivaṁsaṁ tipiṭakadhara dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṁ vinayaṁ puccheyyaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:12: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, ahaṁ āyasmatā javanattherena saṅghanāyaka mahātherassa paṭinidhibhūtena vinayaṁ puṭṭho vissajjeyyaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:14: Pucchā – yaṁ tena āvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena paṭhamaṁ pārājikaṁ kattha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:17: Vissajjanā – sudinnaṁ bhante kalandaputtaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:19: Vissajjanā – sudindo bhante kalandaputto purāṇadutiyikāya methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevi, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:20: Pucchā – atthi āvuso tattha paññatti anupaññatti anuppannapaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:21: Vissajjanā – ekā bhante paññatti dve anupaññattiyo, anuppannapaññatti tasmiṁ natthi.
anya-e0905n0:28: Pucchā – pañcannaṁ āvuso pātimokkhuddesānaṁ katthogadhaṁ kattha pariyāpannaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:30: Pucchā – katamena āvuso uddesena uddesaṁ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n0:31: Vissajjanā – dutiyena bhante uddesena uddesaṁ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n0:32: Pucchā – catunnaṁ āvuso vipattīnaṁ katamā vipatti.
anya-e0905n0:39: Vissajjanā – na evarūpaṁ karissāmīti yāvajīvaṁ āpāṇakoṭikaṁ samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu, ayaṁ bhante paṭipatti.
anya-e0905n0:40: Pucchā – kati āvuso atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā paṭhamaṁ pārājikaṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:41_0: Vissajjanā – dasa bhante atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā paṭhamaṁ pārājikaṁ paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n0:41_2: 4 - pesalānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ phāsuvihārāya, 5 - diṭṭhadhammikānaṁ āsavānaṁ saṁvarāya,
anya-e0905n0:41_3: 6 - samparāyikānaṁ āsavānaṁ paṭighātāya, 7 - appasannānaṁ pasādāya, 8 - pasannānaṁ
anya-e0905n0:49: Vissajjanā – yesaṁ bhante vattati te dhārenti.
anya-e0905n0:51: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n0:55_0: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho ahaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ vicitthasārābhivaṁsaṁ tipiṭakadhara
anya-e0905n0:55_1: dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṁ paṭhamassa pārājikassa nidānampi pucchiṁ, puggalampi pucchiṁ,
anya-e0905n0:55_2: vatthumpi pucchiṁ, paññatti anupaññattiādīnipi pucchiṁ, puṭṭho puṭṭhoca so āyasmāvicittasārābhivaṁso
anya-e0905n0:55_3: vissajjesi, itihidaṁ bhante paṭhamaṁ pārājika sikkhāpadaṁ nimmalaṁ suparisuddhaṁ
anya-e0905n0:55_4: tasseva bhagavato vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa, tasmā yathāpure mahākassapādayo
anya-e0905n0:55_5: mahātheravarā porāṇasaṁgītikārā brahmacariya saṅkhātassa buddhasāsanassa ciraṭṭhitiyā
anya-e0905n0:55_6: bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ
anya-e0905n0:55_7: dhammavinayaṁ saṅgāyiṁsuceva anusaṅgāyiṁsuca, evameva mayampi dāni sabbeva chaṭṭhasaṁgītimahādhammasabhāpariyāpannā
anya-e0905n0:55_8: idaṁ paṭhama pārājika sikkhāpadaṁ ekatosajjhāyanavasena saṁgāyeyyāma.
anya-e0905n0:59_0: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, mahatī ayaṁ parisā, evarūpāya parisāya na sukarā sabbaso
anya-e0905n0:59_1: kathaṁ sāvetuṁ, tasmā āyasmatoca sobhanassa sāsanari sārāmādhivāsino āyasmatoca vicittasārābhivaṁsassa
anya-e0905n0:59_3: āvahituṁ okāsaṁ dammi, karotha tumhe āvuso chaṭṭhasaṁgītipubbaṅgamāni vinayapucchana
anya-e0905n0:62: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, ahaṁ āyasmantaṁ vicittasārābhivaṁsaṁ tipiṭakadhara dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṁ vinayaṁ puccheyyaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:66: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, yadisaṅghassa pattakallaṁ, ahaṁ āyasmatā sobhanattherena saṅghanāyaka mahātherassa paṭinidhibhūtena vinayaṁ puṭṭho vissajjeyyaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:68: Pucchā – yaṁ tena āvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena dutiyaṁ pārājikaṁ kattha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:71: Vissajjanā – dhaniyaṁ bhante kumbhakāraputtaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:73: Vissajjanā – dhaniyo bhante kumbhakāraputto rañño dārūni adinnaṁ ādiyi, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:74: Pucchā – atthi āvuso tattha paññatti anupaññatti anuppannapaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:75: Vissajjanā – ekā bhante paññatti ekā anupaññatti anuppannapaññatti tasmiṁ natthi.
anya-e0905n0:77_0: Vissajjanā – yo pana bhikkhu adinnaṁ theyyasaṅkhātaṁ ādiyeyya, yathārūpe adinnādāne
anya-e0905n0:77_1: rājāno coraṁ gahetvā haneyyuṁvā bandheyyuṁvā pabbājeyyuṁvā corosi bālosi muḷhosi
anya-e0905n0:77_2: thenosīti tathārūpaṁ bhikkhu adinnaṁ ādiyamāno ayampi pārājiko hoti asaṁvāsoti ayaṁ
anya-e0905n0:79: Vissajjanā – gāmāvā araññāvāti ayaṁ bhante tattha anupaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:81_0: Vissajjanā – yo pana bhikkhu gāmāvā araññāvā adinnaṁ theyyasaṅkhātaṁ ādiyeyya, kathārūpe
anya-e0905n0:81_1: adinnādāne rājāno coraṁ gahetvā haneyyuṁvā bandheyyuṁvā pabbājeyyuṁvā corosi bālosi
anya-e0905n0:81_2: mūḷhosi thenosīti tathārūpaṁ bhikkhu adinnaṁ ādiyamāno ayampi pārājiko hoti asaṁvāsoti
anya-e0905n0:88: Pucchā – tasmiṁ āvuso dutiya pārājike adinnaṁ ādiyanto kati āpattiyo āpajjati vibhajitvā vissajjehi.
anya-e0905n0:89_0: Vissajjanā – adinnaṁ bhante ādiyanto tisso āpattiyo āpajjati, pañca māsakaṁvā atireka
anya-e0905n0:89_1: pañca māsakaṁvā agghanakaṁ adinnaṁ theyyasaṅkhātaṁ ādiyati āpatti pārājikassa, ūnapañcamāsakaṁvā
anya-e0905n0:89_2: atirekamāsakaṁvā adinnaṁ theyyasaṅkhātaṁ ādiyati āpatti thullaccayassa, māsakaṁvā
anya-e0905n0:89_3: ūnamāsakavā agghanakaṁ adinnaṁ theyyasaṅkhātaṁ ādiyati āpatti dukkaṭassa, adinnaṁ
anya-e0905n0:89_4: bhante ādiyanto imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
anya-e0905n0:91_0: Vissajjanā – dasannaṁ bhante puggalānaṁ anāpatti, sakasaññissa, vissāsaggāhena gaṇhantassa,
anya-e0905n0:91_1: tāvakālikaṁ gaṇhantassa, petapariggahaṁ gaṇhantassa, tiracchānagatapariggahaṁ gaṇhantassa,
anya-e0905n0:92: Pucchā – pañcannaṁ āvuso pātimokkhuddesānaṁ katthogadhaṁ katthapariyāpannaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:94: Pucchā – katamena āvuso uddesena uddesaṁ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n0:95: Vissajjanā – dutiyena bhante uddesena uddesaṁ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n0:96: Pucchā – catunnaṁ āvuso vipattīnaṁ katamā vipatti.
anya-e0905n0:98: Pucchā – sattannaṁ āvuso āpattikkhandhānaṁ katamo āpattikkhandho.
anya-e0905n0:100: Pucchā – channaṁ āvuso āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0905n0:101: Vissajjanā – tīhi bhante samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti, siyā kāyatoca cittatoca samuṭṭhāti, na vācāto, siyā vācātoca
anya-e0905n0:102: Cittatoca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato, siyā kāyatoca vācātoca cittatoca samuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0905n0:103: Pucchā – catunnaṁ āvuso adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:105: Pucchā – sattannaṁ āvuso samathānaṁ katihi samathehi sammati.
anya-e0905n0:106: Vissajjanā – dvihi bhante samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayenaca paṭiññāta karaṇenaca.
anya-e0905n0:107: Pucchā – ko āvuso tattha vinayo, ko tattha abhivinayo.
anya-e0905n0:108: Vissajjanā – paññatti bhante vinayo vibhatti abhivinayo.
anya-e0905n0:109: Pucchā – kiṁāvuso tattha pātimokkhaṁ kiṁ tattha adhipātimokkhaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:110: Vissajjanā – paññatti bhante pātimokkhaṁ, vibhatti adhipātimokkhaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:116: Vissajjanā – na evarūpaṁ karissāmīti yāvajīvaṁ āpāṇakoṭikaṁ samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu ayaṁ bhante tattha paṭipatti.
anya-e0905n0:117: Pucchā – kati āvuso atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā dutiyaṁ pārājikaṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:118_0: Vissajjanā – dasa bhante atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā dutiyaṁ pārājikaṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:118_1: Saṅghasuṭṭhutāya saṅghaphāsutāya dummaṅkūnaṁ puggalānaṁ niggahāya pesalānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ
anya-e0905n0:118_2: phāsuvihārāya diṭṭhadhammikānaṁ āsavānaṁ saṁvarāya samparāyikānaṁ āsavānaṁ paṭighātāya
anya-e0905n0:118_3: appasannānaṁ pasādāya pasannānaṁ bhiyyobhāvāya saddhammaṭṭhitiyā vinayānuggahāya.
anya-e0905n0:126: Vissajjanā – yesaṁ bhante vattati te dhārenti.
anya-e0905n0:128: Vissajjanā – bhagavatā bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsammuddhassa.
anya-e0905n0:131: Pucchā – atthi nu kho āvuso tattha upanetabbaṁ vā apanetabbaṁ vā akkharapadapaccābhaṭṭhaṁ vā viraddhapadabyañjanaṁ vā.
anya-e0905n0:134_0: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho ahaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ vicittasārābhivaṁsa tipiṭakadharadhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṁ
anya-e0905n0:134_1: dutiyassa pārājikassa nidānampi pucchiṁ, puggalampi pucchiṁ, vatthumpi pucchiṁ, paññattimpi
anya-e0905n0:134_2: pucchiṁ, anupaññattimpi pucchiṁ, āpattimpi pucchiṁ, anāpattimpi pucchiṁ, aññānipi
anya-e0905n0:134_3: īdisāni pucchitabbaṭṭhānāni anekāni pucchiṁ, puṭṭho puṭṭhoca so āyasmā vicittasārābhivaṁso
anya-e0905n0:134_4: vissajjesi. Iti hidaṁ bhante idaṁ dutiyaṁ pārājika sikkhāpadaṁ nimmalaṁ, suparisuddhaṁ,
anya-e0905n0:134_5: tasseva bhagavato vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa, tasmā yathā pure mahākassa pādayo
anya-e0905n0:134_7: bahujanahitāya, bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya, hitāya, sukhāya, devamanussānaṁ
anya-e0905n0:134_8: dhammavinayaṁ saṅgāyiṁsuceva anusaṅgāyiṁsuca, evameva mayampi dāni sabbeva chaṭṭhasaṁgītimahādhammasabhāpariyāpannā
anya-e0905n0:134_9: idaṁ dutiya pārājika sikkhāpadaṁ ekato gaṇasajjhāyaṁ katvā samaggā sammodamānā hutvā saṅgāyeyyāma.
anya-e0905n0:136: Pucchā – yaṁ tena āvuso bhagavatā (pa) sammāsambuddhena tatiyaṁ pārājikaṁ kattha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:139: Vissajjanā – sambahule bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:141: Vissajjanā – sambahulā bhante bhikkhu aññamaññaṁ jīvitā voropesuṁ, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:142: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso tattha paññatti anupaññatti anuppannapaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:143: Vissajjanā – ekā bhante paññatti, ekā anupaññatti, anuppannapaññatti tasmiṁ natthi.
anya-e0905n0:145: Vissajjanā – yopana bhikkhu sañcicca manussaviggahaṁ jīvitā voropeyya, satthahārakaṁvāssa pariyeseyya ayampi pārājiko hoti asaṁvāsoti ayaṁ bhante tattha mūlapaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:147: Vissajjanā – maraṇavaṇṇaṁ vā saṁvaṇṇeyya maraṇāya vā samādapeyya ambhopurisa kiṁ tuyhiminā pāpakena dujjīvitena matante jīvitā
anya-e0905n0:148: Seyyāti iti cittamano cittasaṅkappo anekapariyāyena maraṇavaṇṇaṁ vā saṁvaṇṇeyya maraṇāya vā samādapeyyāti ayaṁ bhante tattha anupaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:150_0: Vissajjanā – yo pana bhikkhu sañcicca manussaviggahaṁ jīvitā voropeyya, satthahārakaṁvāssa
anya-e0905n0:150_1: pariyeseyya, maraṇavaṇṇaṁ vā saṁvaṇṇeyya, maraṇāya vā samādapeyya, ambho purisa kiṁ
anya-e0905n0:150_2: tuyhiminā pāpakena dujjīvitena matante jīvitā seyyoti iti cittamano cittasaṅkappo
anya-e0905n0:150_3: anekapariyāyena maraṇavaṇṇaṁvā saṁvaṇṇeyya, maraṇāya vā samādapeyya, ayampi pārājiko
anya-e0905n0:150_4: hoti asaṁvāsoti ayaṁ bhante tattha paripuṇṇapaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:155: Pucchā – ekatopaññatti nukho āvuso ubhatopaññatti nukho.
anya-e0905n0:157: Pucchā – tasmiṁ āvuso tatiya pārājike sañcicca manussaviggahaṁ jīvitā voropento kati āpattiyo āpajjati.
anya-e0905n0:158_0: Vissajjanā – sañcissa bhante manussaviggahaṁ jīvitā voropento tisso āpattiyo āpajjati,
anya-e0905n0:158_1: manussaṁ odissa papātaṁ khaṇati papatitvā marissatīti āpatti dukkaṭassa, papatite
anya-e0905n0:158_2: dukkhā vedanā uppajjati āpatti thullaccayassa, marati āpatti pārājikassa, sañcicca
anya-e0905n0:158_3: bhante manussaviggahaṁ jīvitā voropento imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
anya-e0905n0:160: Vissajjanā – sattannaṁ bhante puggalānaṁ anāpatti, asañcicca mārentassa, ajānantassa, na maraṇādhippāyassa, ummattakassa, khittacittassa, vedanāṭṭassa, ādikammikassa.
anya-e0905n0:161: Pucchā – pañcannaṁ āvuso pātimokkhuddesānaṁ katthogadhaṁ kattha pariyāpannaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:163: Pucchā – katamena āvuso uddesena uddesaṁ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n0:164: Vissajjanā – dutiyena bhante uddesena uddesaṁ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n0:165: Pucchā – catunnaṁ āvuso vipattīnaṁ katamā vipatti.
anya-e0905n0:167: Pucchā – sattannaṁ āvuso āpattikkhandhānaṁ katamo āpattikkhandho.
anya-e0905n0:169: Pucchā – channaṁ āvuso āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0905n0:170_0: Vissajjanā – channaṁ bhante āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti, siyā
anya-e0905n0:170_1: kāyatoca cittatoca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato , siyā vācatoca cittatoca samuṭṭhāti, na
anya-e0905n0:170_2: kāyato, siyā kāyatoca vācatoca cittatoca samuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0905n0:171: Pucchā – catunnaṁ āvuso adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:173: Pucchā – sattannaṁ āvuso samathānaṁ katihi samathehi sammati.
anya-e0905n0:174: Vissajjanā – sattānaṁ bhante samathānaṁ dvīhi samathehi sammati, sammukhā vinayenaca paṭiññātakaraṇenaca.
anya-e0905n0:175: Pucchā – ko tattha āvuso vinayo ko tattha abhivinayo.
anya-e0905n0:176: Vissajjanā – paññatti bhante vinayo vibhatti abhivinayo.
anya-e0905n0:177: Pucchā – kiṁ āvuso tattha pātimokkhaṁ kiṁ adhipātimokkhaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:178: Vissajjanā – paññatti bhante pātimokkhaṁ vibhatti adhipātimokkhaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:184: Vissajjanā – na evarūpaṁ karissāmīti yāvajīvaṁ āpāṇakoṭikaṁ samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu ayaṁ bhante tattha paṭipatti.
anya-e0905n0:185: Pucchā – kati āvuso atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā tatiyaṁ pārājikaṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:186: Vissajjanā – dasa bhante atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā tatiyaṁ pārājikaṁ paññattaṁ saṅghasuṭṭhutāya saṅghaphāsutāya (pa) vinayānuggahāya.
anya-e0905n0:194: Vissajjanā – yesaṁ bhante vattati te dhārenti.
anya-e0905n0:196: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n0:199: Pucchā – atthinukho āvuso tattha kiñci upanetabbaṁ vā apanetabbaṁ vā akkharapadapaccābhaṭṭhaṁ vā viraddhapadabyañjanaṁ vā.
anya-e0905n0:202_0: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, ahaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ vicittasārābhivaṁsaṁ tipiṭakadhara
anya-e0905n0:202_1: dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṁ tatiyassa pārājikassa nidānampi pucchiṁ, puggalampi pucchiṁ,
anya-e0905n0:202_2: vatthumpi pucchiṁ, paññattimpi pucchiṁ, anupaññattimpi pucchiṁ, āpattimpi pucchiṁ,
anya-e0905n0:202_3: anāpattimpi pucchiṁ, aññānipi evarūpāni pucchitabbaṭṭhānāni anekāni pucchiṁ, puṭṭho
anya-e0905n0:202_4: puṭṭhoca so āyasmā vicittasārābhivaṁso vissajjesi, itihidaṁ bhante tatiyapārājikasikkhāpadaṁ
anya-e0905n0:202_5: nimmalaṁ suparisuddhaṁ tasseva bhagavato vacanaṁ arahato sammāsammuddhassa, tasmā
anya-e0905n0:202_6: yathā pure mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā porāṇasaṁgītikārā brahmacariyasaṅkhātassa
anya-e0905n0:202_7: buddhasāsanassa ciraṭṭhitiyā bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya
anya-e0905n0:202_8: hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ dhammavinayaṁ saṅgāyiṁsuceva anusaṅgāyiṁsuca, evameva
anya-e0905n0:202_9: mayampi dāni sabbeva chaṭṭhasaṁgītimahādhammasabhāpariyāpannā idaṁ tatiyapārājikasikkhāpadaṁ
anya-e0905n0:202_10: ekato gaṇasajjhāyaṁ katvā samaggā sammodamānā hutvā saṁgāyeyyāma.
anya-e0905n0:204: Pucchā – yaṁ tena āvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena catutthaṁ pārājikaṁ kattha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:207: Vissajjanā – vaggumudātīriye bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:209: Vissajjanā – vaggumudātīriyā bhante bhikkhū gihīnaṁ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsiṁsu, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:210: Pucchā – atthi āvuso tattha paññatti anupaññatti anuppannapaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:211: Vissajjanā – ekā bhante paññatti ekā anupaññatti anuppannapaññatti tasmiṁ natthi.
anya-e0905n0:213_0: Vissajjanā – yo pana bhikkhu anabhijānaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ
anya-e0905n0:213_1: attupanāyikaṁ alamariyañāṇadassanaṁ samudācareyya, itijānāmi itipassāmīti, tato aparena
anya-e0905n0:213_2: samayena samanuggāhīya mānovā asamanuggāhīya mānovā āpanno visuddhāpekkho evaṁ vadeyya
anya-e0905n0:213_3: ajānamevaṁ āvuso avacaṁ jānāmi apassaṁ passāmi tucchaṁ musāvilapinti ayampi pārājiko
anya-e0905n0:213_4: hoti asaṁvāsoti ayaṁ bhante tattha mūlapaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:215: Vissajjanā – aññatra adhimānāti ayaṁ bhante tattha anupaññatti.
anya-e0905n0:216_0: Honti ye te ānanda bhikkhū adiṭṭhe diṭṭhasaññino apatte pattasaññino anadhigate adhigatasaññino
anya-e0905n0:216_1: asacchikate sacchikatasaññano adhimānena aññaṁ byākaronti, tañca kho etaṁ abbohārikaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:218_0: Vissajjanā – yopana bhikkhu anabhijānaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ attupanāyikaṁ alamariyañāṇadassanaṁ
anya-e0905n0:218_1: samudācareyya, iti jānāmi iti passāmīti, tato aparena samayena samanuggāhīyamānovā
anya-e0905n0:218_2: asamanuggāhīyamānovā āpanno visuddhāpekkho evaṁ vadeyya ajānamevaṁ āvuso avacaṁjānāmi
anya-e0905n0:218_3: apassaṁ passāmi tucchaṁ musā vilapinti, aññatra adhimānā ayampi pārājiko hoti asaṁvāsoti
anya-e0905n0:219: Pucchā – sabbatthapaññatti nukho āvuso padesapaññatti nukho.
anya-e0905n0:223: Pucchā – ekatopaññatti nukho āvuso ubhato paññatti nukho.
anya-e0905n0:225: Pucchā – tasmiṁ āvuso catuttha pārājike asantaṁ abhūtaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapanto kati āpattiyo āpajjati, vibhajitvā vissajjehi.
anya-e0905n0:226_0: Vissajjanā – tasmiṁ bhante catutthapārājike asantaṁ abhūtaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ
anya-e0905n0:226_1: ullapanto tisso āpattiyo āpajjati, asantaṁ abhūtaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapati
anya-e0905n0:226_2: āpattipārājikassa, yo te vihāre vasati so bhikkhu arahāti bhaṇati paṭivijānantassa
anya-e0905n0:226_3: āpatti thullaccayassa, appaṭivijānantassa āpatti dukkaṭassa, uttarimanussadhammaṁ
anya-e0905n0:226_4: bhante ullapanto imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
anya-e0905n0:228: Vissajjanā – channaṁ bhante puggalānaṁ anāpatti adhimānena bhaṇantassa anullapanādhippāyassa ummattakassa khittacittassa vedanāṭṭassa ādikammikassa.
anya-e0905n0:229: Pucchā – pañcannaṁ āvuso pātimokkhuddesānaṁ katthogadhaṁ kattha pariyāpannaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:231: Pucchā – katamena āvuso uddesena uddesaṁ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n0:232: Vissajjanā – dutiyena bhante uddesena uddesaṁ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n0:233: Pucchā – catunnaṁ āvuso vipattīnaṁ katamā vipatti.
anya-e0905n0:235: Pucchā – sattannaṁ āvuso āpattikkhandhānaṁ katamo āpattikkhandho.
anya-e0905n0:237: Pucchā – channaṁ āvuso āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0905n0:238_0: Vissajjanā – channaṁ bhante āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti, siyā
anya-e0905n0:238_1: kāyatoca cittatoca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato, siyā vācatoca cittatoca samuṭṭhāti, na
anya-e0905n0:238_2: kāyato, siyā kāyatoca vācatoca cittatoca samuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0905n0:239: Pucchā – catunnaṁ āvuso adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:241: Pucchā – sattannaṁ āvuso samathānaṁ katihi samathehi sammati.
anya-e0905n0:242: Vissajjanā – sattannaṁ bhante samathānaṁ dvīhi samathehi sammati, sammukhāvinayenaca paṭiññātakaraṇenaca.
anya-e0905n0:243: Pucchā – ko tattha āvuso vinayo, ko tattha abhivinayo.
anya-e0905n0:244: Vissajjanā – paññatti bhante vinayo, vibhatti abhivinayo.
anya-e0905n0:245: Pucchā – kiṁ āvuso tattha pātimokkhaṁ, kiṁ adhipātimokkhaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:246: Vissajjanā – paññatti bhante pātimokkhaṁ, vibhatti adhipātimokkhaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:252: Vissajjanā – na evarūpaṁ karissāmīti yāvajīvaṁ āpāṇakoṭikaṁ samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu ayaṁ bhante tattha paṭipatti.
anya-e0905n0:253: Pucchā – kati āvuso atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā catutthaṁ pārājikaṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n0:254: Vissajjanā – dasa bhante atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā catutthaṁ pārājikaṁ paññattaṁ, saṅghasuṭṭhutāya saṅghaphāsutāya…pe… vinayānuggahāya.
anya-e0905n0:262: Vissajjanā – yesaṁ bhante vattati te dhārenti.
anya-e0905n0:264: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n0:267: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso tattha kiñci upanetabbaṁ vā apanetabbaṁ vā akkharapadapaccābhaṭṭhaṁ vā viraddhapadabyañjanaṁ vā.
